Heading: Problems in school?
Value: Failed out of college because of drinking

Heading: Teased while in school?
Value: Made fun of on occasion for being different/wild

Heading: Psychologically abused?
Value: Parents divorce, mother may have had a mental illness, neglect

Heading: Sexually abused?
Value: Possibly by a neighbor, but denied by Dahmer

Heading: Mother abused drugs/alcohol
Value: NA, but high strung from her father’s alcoholism

Heading: Type of discharge
Value: Dishonorable and early for habitual drunkenness

Heading: Saw combat duty
Value: No, but was a combat medic in Germany

Heading: Applied for job as a cop?
Types of jobs worked
Value: Sub shop, chocolate factory, plasma center, nursery

Heading: Animal torture
Value: Unlikely, preferred dead animals, however, some sources say yes

Heading: Committed previous crimes?
Value: Yes- drunkenness, disorderly conduct, indecent exposure, child molesting

Heading: Victim type
Value: Homosexual male teenagers and young men

Heading: Killer age at start of series
How close did killer live?
Value: Typically occurred at his apartment or his grandmother’s house, where he was living

Heading: Killing occurred in home of victim?
Killing occurred in home of killer?
Weapon
Value: Typically, no weapon was used to kill the victim.

Heading: Posed the body?
Value: Yes, took pictures before and after death

Heading: Left at scene, no attempt to hide
Left at scene, buried
Value: 1st victim, but later dug him up
